Sentencas: In this work, a fully three-dimensional mathematical model for planar porous-electrode-supported (PES) solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) has been constructed to simulate the steady state electrochemical characteristics and multi-species/heat transport.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of electrochemical characteristics and heat/species transport for planar porous-electrode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: The variation of chemical species concentrations, temperature, potential, current and current density for two types of PES-SOFC developed by central research institute of electric power industry (CRIEPI) of Japan are studied in the co-flow pattern.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of electrochemical characteristics and heat/species transport for planar porous-electrode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: In the numerical computation, the governing equations for continuity, momentum, mass, energy and electrical charge conservation are solved simultaneously using the finite volume method.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of electrochemical characteristics and heat/species transport for planar porous-electrode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: Activation, ohmic, and concentration polarizations are considered as the main sources of irreversibility.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of electrochemical characteristics and heat/species transport for planar porous-electrode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: The Butler-Volmer equation, Ohm's law, and Darcy's gas model with constant porosity and permeability are used to determine the polarization over-potential, respectively.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of electrochemical characteristics and heat/species transport for planar porous-electrode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: The output voltages measured in experiments and calculated using the above models agree well.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of electrochemical characteristics and heat/species transport for planar porous-electrode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: For the cell using the same material and manufacturing process, the results show the type-II PES-SOFC is with better performance.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of electrochemical characteristics and heat/species transport for planar porous-electrode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: However, the electrolyte of type-II PES-SOFC should be with higher maximum ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of electrochemical characteristics and heat/species transport for planar porous-electrode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: Furthermore, these results will be used to evaluate the overall performance of a PES-SOFC stack, and to significantly help optimize their design and operation in practical applications.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of electrochemical characteristics and heat/species transport for planar porous-electrode-supported SOFC
